Articles.Content:
i know its probably really simple but why does my IVA window say KIA where the kerbal should be?

screenshot: http://imgur.com/Q9bW09T

KIA stands for "Killed In Action". It says he's dead.

Best,

-Slashy

He's dead, Jim. Killed In Action.

RIP Tomble Kerman.
Why does this happen? It happens to me when i am in a craft that crashes and then my focus auto changes to another close by craft. I can still EVA the KIA kerbal.
the KIA screen is pretty old, I don't remember the version in which it was replaced by the kerbal portraits being removed (maybe .16-.21?). It still creeps in every now and then :/

He's dead, Jim. Killed In Action.

RIP Tomble Kerman.

Was he wearing a Red shirt?

Why does this happen? It happens to me when i am in a craft that crashes and then my focus auto changes to another close by craft. I can still EVA the KIA kerbal.

It's a bug, and it is caused by this exact scenario. I once had the KIA screen not show, and what laid underneath looked like the Kraken got hold of the poor thing.
I actually forgot about this oh those were the days....
